cause.description:
Today, you can see a wide variety of independent spirits, showing the best of creative expression and independent thought. Tomorrow, if the local government gets its way, you will see but a pale shadow of this. A drastically reduced number of vendors, forced into regulated pigeon-hole spaces they cannot leave. There will be no spontaneous displays, as empty spots cannot just be taken up by a visiting vendor. Where once vendors and artisans from around the US and the rest of the world could come, and if they found a spot, parade their wares, there will be only the vacant stares of disbelief as they are turned away, having not been able to partake in the diabolical "lottery" system.
1. Freedom Of Speech
2. Keep Art & Speech Alive
3. The right to pursue the creative spirit
cause.mission: the local government has launched an unprecedented attack on our constitutionally protected right to free speech and our bequeathed right to pursue the creative spirit
cause.name: SAVE VENICE BEACH
